preparation.raw_text:
1. In a fume hood, carefully weigh out 15.75 g of arsenic and 5.25 g of phosphorus. 
 2. In a separate container, weigh 81 g of ruthenium and 13.5 g of samarium. 
 3. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 4. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly grind the mixture until homogeneous.
